Translations.Text: Wa Laqad Fatanna Qablahum Qawma Fir`awna Wa Ja'ahum Rasulun Karimun
Wa 'An La Ta`lu `Ala Allahi 'Inni 'Atikum Bisultanin Mubinin
Wa Atruki Al-Bahra Rahwan 'Innahum Jundun Mughraquna
Fama Bakat `Alayhimu As-Sama'u Wa Al-'Arđu Wa Ma Kanu Munzarina
Wa Laqad Najjayna Bani 'Isra'ila Mina Al-`Adhabi Al-Muhini
Wa 'Ataynahum Mina Al-'Ayati Ma Fihi Bala'un Mubinun
In Hiya 'Illa Mawtatuna Al-'Ula Wa Ma Nahnu Bimunsharina
Ahum Khayrun 'Am Qawmu Tubba`in Wa Al-Ladhina Min Qablihim 'Ahlaknahum 'Innahum Kanu Mujrimina
Wa Ma Khalaqna As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđa Wa Ma Baynahuma La`ibina
Ma Khalaqnahuma 'Illa Bil-Haqqi Wa Lakinna 'Aktharahum La Ya`lamuna
Yawma La Yughni Mawlaan `An Mawlaan Shay'aan Wa La Hum Yunsaruna
Illa Man Rahima Allahu 'Innahu Huwa Al-`Azizu Ar-Rahimu
Thumma Subbu Fawqa Ra'sihi Min `Adhabi Al-Hamimi
Inna Hadha Ma Kuntum Bihi Tamtaruna
La Yadhuquna Fiha Al-Mawta 'Illa Al-Mawtata Al-'Ula Wa Waqahum `Adhaba Al-Jahimi
Fađlaan Min Rabbika Dhalika Huwa Al-Fawzu Al-`Azimu
Tanzilu Al-Kitabi Mina Allahi Al-`Azizi Al-Hakimi
Inna Fi As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi La'ayatin Lilmu'uminina
Wa Fi Khalqikum Wa Ma Yabuththu Min Dabbatin 'Ayatun Liqawmin Yuqinuna
Wa Akhtilafi Al-Layli Wa An-Nahari Wa Ma 'Anzala Allahu Mina As-Sama'i Min Rizqin Fa'ahya Bihi Al-'Arđa Ba`da Mawtiha Wa Tasrifi Ar-Riyahi 'Ayatun Liqawmin Ya`qiluna
Tilka 'Ayatu Allahi Natluha `Alayka Bil-Haqqi Fabi'ayyi Hadithin Ba`da Allahi Wa 'Ayatihi Yu'uminuna
Yasma`u 'Ayati Allahi Tutla `Alayhi Thumma Yusirru Mustakbiraan Ka'an Lam Yasma`ha Fabashirhu Bi`adhabin 'Alimin
Wa 'Idha `Alima Min 'Ayatina Shay'aan Attakhadhaha Huzuan 'Ula'ika Lahum `Adhabun Muhinun
Min Wara'ihim Jahannamu Wa La Yughni `Anhum Ma Kasabu Shay'aan Wa La Ma Attakhadhu Min Duni Allahi 'Awliya'a Wa Lahum `Adhabun `Azimun
Hadha Hudaan Wa Al-Ladhina Kafaru Bi'ayati Rabbihim Lahum `Adhabun Min Rijzin 'Alimun
